overview: Jenna's secret desires become unleashed when her husband catches her masturbating to lesbian porn. When Jimmy notices a growing attraction between his wife, Abigail, and her best friend, Karlie, he encourages them to take things a step further. Mia is pleasantly surprised by her husband's growing excitement when she confesses to sharing a stolen kiss with another woman. Passions ignite when Ryan helps his wife, Melissa, hatch a plan to seduce their sexually experienced neighbor.
title: My Wife's First Girlfriend
